summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West 58th Street, in the City of Seattle from 11th Avenue Northwest to a point 300 feet west of 15th Avenue Northwest, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins, and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, all in accordance with Resolution No. 805 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
